channel.title: Visual item viewer
channel.description:
hi guys, i was wondering if there was a peace of software or a program that can view items on a 317 server. its a pain adding stuff to shops without seeing what it is. you do have item lists yes but it would just be so much eaiser if all you had to do was open a program, drop in the Id and click search. hopefully there is one :| if not oh well back to looking at didgets and letters...
many thanks
The Tormented
*RSPS: The Tormented (% complete: 60%)

item.title: Visual item viewer
item.dc:creator: @The_Tormented The Tormented
item.description:
@The_Tormented wrote:

kk thanks for the advice on sig, also i have over 70 shops :eek: its taking forever lol

The Tormented

Read full topic

item.title: Visual item viewer
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“The Tormented, post:1, topic:382474”]hi guys, i was wondering if there was a peace of software or a program that can view items on a 317 server. its a pain adding stuff to shops without seeing what it is. you do have item lists yes but it would just be so much eaiser if all you had to do was open a program, drop in the Id and click search. hopefully there is one if not oh well back to looking at didgets and letters…

many thanks

The Tormented

*RSPS: The Tormented (% complete: 60%)[/quote]

Instead of putting “*RSPS: The Tormented (% complete: 60%)” On every single post, just make a signature

Also, I don’t think that there is program like that, it takes two seconds to make a shop and test it. Don’t be lazy.

Read full topic
